entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carman 1:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -22.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -27.6°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
